attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To abolish all MP's expenses other than those justified under the same tax laws as all other citizens. There are many tax paying citizens that travel long distances to their work and many that have to stay away from their homes in order to find work. NO 2nd Homes for MP's. It should just be treated as any other job.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
